Articles.Content:
Well, Jebediah found his favorite sport. Here is how he found it.

(In a hitchiker, during a duna transfer) (each kerbal was allowed to bring one magazine.)

Bob: I brought a sports magazine!

Bill: I brought a how to deal with a crazy person magazine (points at jeb)

Jeb: I brought Crashes, Explosions, Xtreme!

(15 minutes later)

Bob: Hey, there is a page about water skiing!

Jeb: BOOOORING.............. not enough danger.

Bob: well why don't you make a better sport yourself then?

Jeb: Challenge accepted........

(1 year later, arrived on Kerbin)

Jeb: Well, Bob, I just made the best sport ever!

Bob: How?

Jeb: Well, i was browsing Kbay on my Komputer, and i saw the Kerbal Attachment System!. I instantly had a idea....

Bill: What you guys talking about? sounds dangerous.......

Jeb: wait, gotta run......

Bob: Eh, whatever... Wait. Is that a jet engine?

Bill: Oh no, dangerous!

Jeb: DIVE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! AIRSKIING IS FUN!!!!!!!!!!!

Bob&Bill: Typical Jebediah.
hehe. that is pretty silly, even by jeb's standards.
See how close to the ocean you can swing him
Now that I think of it. I've seen some pretty fast boats here on the forum. With the .20 Kerbal seat and KAS you could actually go water skiing.
Yup, i saw you could attach Kerbals with KAS, and i had a brilliant idea. The first tries resulted in dragging test subjects along the runway at 50 m/s.
